long_description: The Joby Gorillapod Grip Tight stand supports a smartphone, wraps around nearly anything and grips onto nearly any surface. Unlike traditional tripods, Gorillapod doesn't require an elevated flat surface for you to take the perfect shot. Flexible joints help Gorillapod bend and rotate 360deg to form the perfect shape. Ring and foot grips that provide extra gripping power to most surfaces. The Joby Gorillapod Grip Tight stand features features a spring-loaded tensioner that accommodates phones ranging 2 - 3 in. in width.
short_description: The Joby Gorillapod Grip Tight stand supports a smartphone, wraps around nearly anything and grips onto nearly any surface.
